txt.en: You fed the hungry riders and restored some of their strength, as well as eased their appetites.
The cauldron can be found in the War-stead of the Helmingas.\n\nYou should collect porridge from the cauldron.
Hungry Rohirrim can be found in the War-steads of the Helmingas and the King's Men.\n\nYou should feed the hungry riders.
You have fed all the hungry riders. Now they should have the strength to keep moving south towards Minas Tirith.
Dúnhere needs someone to serve porridge to the hungry riders.

'The men under my command are in need of a good meal. We have ridden as swiftly as our horses could take us. If you have a moment, could you bring some porridge to my men? It would be most appreciated, kind [placeholder].'\n\nDúnhere points to a nearby cauldron.
